```{r echo=TRUE, eval=TRUE}
here::here()
mavium_vfs <- readr::read_tsv(file="../data/mavium_vfs.txt",
                              col_names=T)

                              col_names=T)

rmarkdown::paged_table(mavium_vfs_nonmce)
```
